about_the_game:
Some memes about Eternal Liiivie.
※Because of the different progress of the plot, the memes of each chapter are different folders.
※It is recommended to play the game first.
Illustrator: Sama, Plumko
detailed_description:
Some memes about Eternal Liiivie.
※Because of the different progress of the plot, the memes of each chapter are different folders.
※It is recommended to play the game first.
Illustrator: Sama, Plumko

fullgame.name: Eternal Liiivie - EP1 Liiivie Isolated From the World
